Biography: Hello, my name is Forrest Richardson and I love building software.
I work full-time as a software engineer at FIS Global and part-time as a Network Operations officer (25A) in the Army National Guard.

In my current role I work on a full-stack application utilizing C# and the ASP.NET framework. On the personal side I have been exploring other development stacks; my recent projects have been in the Angular and NodeJS frameworks with MongoDB databases.
